items: Stand at the bottom of the StrongMan Power Stairs with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Grasp the handles of the sled and begin to pull it towards you.
As the sled moves towards you, take a step up onto the first stair with your right foot.
Follow with your left foot, stepping up onto the first stair as well.
Continue to step up the stairs, alternating your feet with each step.
As you climb, keep your core engaged and your back straight.
Once you reach the top of the stairs, step back down to the bottom and repeat for desired number of reps.
Targets multiple muscle groups including legs, glutes, back, and core
Enhances grip strength and forearm muscles
Simulates real-life functional movements such as carrying heavy objects up stairs
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
Provides a challenging and fun workout
